sidebar.step_0.description: Hlola tinsita tetfu letisetulu kakhulu kanye nemitfombo yetfu ukuze utfole kuphepha kwetakhamiti kwe-OHS endzaweni yakho yekusebenta.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Wawati yini kutsi kusebentisa baphatsi labatetemeleka futsi labanemikhuba lemihle kunganciphisa ingoti endzaweni yekusebenta ngekucinisekisa kutsi umsebenti uphothulwa ngesikhatsi futsi ngetingadzi letiphakeme tekwalithi nekuphepha?
intro.title: Wamukelekile e-SafetyHelp
intro.description: Hlola tinsita tetfu letisetulu kakhulu kanye nemitfombo yetfu ukuze utfole kuphepha kwetakhamiti kwe-OHS endzaweni yakho yekusebenta.
welcome.title: Wamukelekile e-SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Indawo yakho leyitfembekako yekuphepha kwetakhamiti (OHS) eNingizimu Afrika. Sitfulela tinsita letitawusebenta ngelwati, letisebentisa AI ukuze sicinisekise kuphepha nekutfobela umthetho emadwaleni ekusebenta, etikolweni, emasontweni, nasezindzaweni letingahlelekile. Hlanganyela nemphakatsi wetfu ukuze utfole tinsita, tinsiza, kanye nemvuselelo leyakhelwe ngalokukhethekile timfuno takho.
why_choose.title: Kungani Kufanele Ukhetse i-SafetyHelp ngeKutfobela i-OHS?
why_choose.content: I-SafetyHelp ngumlingani wakho lotetfembekako ekutfobeleni kuphepha kwetakhamiti eNingizimu Afrika. Indawo yetfu yekusebenta itfula seti yensita letisetulu letakhelwe ngalokukhethekile ukuze ihlangabezane netimfuno letikhethekile temabhizinisi afana nekwakha, kwekwemba, kanye nekukhiqita. Kusukela ekwakheni tijalasi temthetho kuya ekuhloleni ingoti, i-SafetyHelp yenta lula timfuno letilukhuni te-OHS ngekusebentisa ti-wizard letilula kakhulu kusetjentiswa kanye nemvuselelo yesikhatsi sangempela nge-chatbot yetfu lesebenta nge-AI. Lesekelwa ngumthetho weNingizimu Afrika kanye nemikhuba lemihle, sinika emabhizinisi amandla ekwakha tindzawo tekusebenta letiphephile kantsi ngesikhatsi lesifanako sicinisekisa kutfobela i-OHSA kanye ne-COIDA. Hlanganyela nemashumi emalunga labatetfembekako labatfola i-SafetyHelp kutfobela kuphepha kwe-OHS kanye nekulula tinhlelo tekuphepha.
legal_obligations.client.title: Lusito Lwekhasimende
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Umthetho Wekwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela Kuhlolwa Kwengozi Yekucala (BRA) lokuchaza tingoti temsebenti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Umthetho Wekwakha 5(1)(b): Niketa imininingo Yetakhamiti neKuphepha lechaza timfuno letikhethekile temsebenti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Umthetho Wekwakha 5(1)(l): Yamukela iSigaba Setakhamiti neKuphepha Sekankontileka ngaphambi kwekutsi umsebenti ucale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Lusito Lwekankontileka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Umthetho Wekwakha 7(1)(a): Tfumela iSigaba Setakhamiti neKuphepha lesekelwe phezu kwemininingo yekhasimende.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Umthetho Wekwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina iFayili Yetakhamiti neKuphepha esayithini lenemibhalo yonkhe lefunekako.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Umthetho Wekwakha 9: Yenta Kuhlolwa Kwengozi kanye neKuhlola Ingoti Yekuphepha (HIRAs) ngalokukhethekile ngemsebenti.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Lusito Lwemsebenti Wetakhamiti neKuphepha
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Umthetho Wekwakha 5(5): Baphatsi (PrCHSA) balawule Takhamiti neKuphepha egameni lekhasimende, bacinisekise kutfobela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Umthetho Wekwakha 8(5): Emaphoyisa (CHSO) asite bakankontileka ekutfobeleni kanye nekuhlola tindzawo tetakhamiti nekuphepha.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Tinhlelo te-SACPCMP: Kufanele ugcine kubhalisa kanye netimfuno te-CPD ngekwesigaba semsebenti.

resources.description: Ngabe udzinga lusito lwekusebenta ngalokukhethekile? Tsintsana nemasebenti labavunywe ngetimfuno temsebenti wakho.

footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Unetindzaba
chatbot.response: Ngilapha kute ngikusite! Ngekwelulekwa kwe-OHS lokwakhelwe wena, sicelo tsintsana nemsebenti.
construction.title: Kuphepha Kwetakhamiti Ekwakheni
construction.description: Cinisekisa kutfobela imithetho yekuphepha kwetakhamiti ekwakheni ngekusebentisa tinsita te-OHS te-SafetyHelp. Tinsita tetfu tiwusita kulawula tingoti, kutfobela timfuno temthetho, kanye nekuvikela bantfu lababekwe esayithini, kutfobela imikhuba lemihle lechazwe ku 'Kuphepha Kwakucala: Tinsita te-OHS.'
legal_appointments.title: Kubekwa Ngemthetho
legal_appointments.description: Lawula kubekwa ngemthetho kwe-OHS njengoba kufunwa ngumthetho we-OHS weNingizimu Afrika. Sebentisa i-organogram ukuze ubeke bantfu emisebentini, ugcwalise imininingo yalabo labakhetfwe, bese wakha umaphepha lohlanganisa tonkhe imininingo, letinye letichazako, kanye netinye letinye.
organogram.title: I-Organogram Yekubekwa Ngemthetho kwe-OHS
organogram.form.name: Ligama Lemuntfu Lokhetfwe
legislation.title: Umthetho
legislation.description: Tfolela indzawo yemthetho ye-OHS, tingadzi, kanye netintlafatso. Yakha tijalasi temthetho te-OHS, funa umthetho loqondzile, kanye nekuhlola kuhlobana kwemthetho. Imibhalo lenemiloco leyentiwe lula iyafumaneka ukuze itsengwe kute umaphepha lomthetho lonzima utfolakale lula.
legislation.tools.title: Tinsita Temthetho
legislation.updates.title: Tintlafatso Temthetho kanye Netichazelo Temthetho
legislation.standards.title: Tingadzi te-OHS
services.title: Tinsiza te-SafetyHelp
services.description: Hlola tinhlobo letinyenti tetinsiza tekuphepha kwetakhamiti letakhelwe kusekela tindzawo tekusebenta, tikolo, emasontweni, kanye netindzawo letingahlelekile eNingizimu Afrika. Kusukela ekucocisaneni kuya ekucatjweni, i-SafetyHelp itfula tindlela letakhelwe ngalokukhethekile kute icinisekise kutfobela kanye nekuphepha.
services.consulting.title: Kwelulekwa Nge-OHS
services.consulting.description: Tfolela kwelulekwa ngemsebenti ngekutfobela i-OHS, kulawula ingoti, kanye nekubekwa ngemthetho kusuka emasebentini etfu labavunywe. Sisebente nemakhasimende afana ne-Anglo Platinum, ABSA, kanye ne-Metrorail kute sinikele tindlela letakhelwe ngalokukhethekile.
services.training.title: Tinhlelo Tekucatjwa
services.training.description: Tfolela tinhlelo tekucatjwa letisetulu letifaka konkhe lokusebentako, lokufaka ekwakheni, kwekwemba, kanye nekufundza. Khetha kucatjwa kwekucala, tinhlelo letikhethekile tesigaba, kanye netinye, tonkhe titfobela umthetho we-OHS weNingizimu Afrika.
services.audits.title: Kuhlolwa kanye Nekuhlolwa Kwemabhuku
services.audits.description: Cinisekisa kutsi indzawo yakho yekusebenta itfobela tingadzi te-OHS ngetinsiza tetfu tekuhlolwa kanye nekuhlolwa kwemabhuku. Tinsita tetfu tiwusita kwekwenta kuhlolwa lokusetulu, kutfola tibiko, kanye nekuhlela tinhlelo tekulungisa.
services.risk_management.title: Tinhlelo Tekulawula Ingozi
services.risk_management.description: Yakha tinhlelo tekulawula ingoti (RMPs) letakhelwe ngalokukhethekile letifaka umthetho weNingizimu Afrika, imithetho yemkhandlu, kanye netingadzi temhlaba afana ne-ISO 45001, kucinisekisa kutsi bhizinisi yakho ilungele tonkhe tingoti.
services.support.title: Lusito kanye Netinsita Temphakatsi
services.support.description: Hlanganyela nemphakatsi wetfu kute utfole tibiko teganeko, utfole tinhlelo tekuhlolwa kwekuphepha kwemaveni e-spaza, tikolo, kanye netavern, kanye nekutsinstsa neminye imisebenti ye-OHS kute utfole lusito kanye nekusebentisana.
training.title: Kucatjwa Lokusetulu Lwendzawo Yekusebenta
training.description: Hlola tinhlelo tetfu tekucatjwa letisetulu letindzawo tekusebenta kute ucinisekise kutfobela umthetho we-OHS weNingizimu Afrika kanye nekukhutsata indzawo yekusebenta lephephile. Khetha kucatjwa lokusebentako, kucatjwa kwetindvuna, noma usebentise i-wizard yetfu ukuze utfole tinkhulumo letakhelwe ngalokukhethekile ngekwemsebenti wakho, bantfu labakhetfwe, kanye nendawo.
training.action_buttons.view_manual: Tfola iBukhana Yekucatjwa Leyakhelwe Ngendlela Yakho
training.wizard.start: Sicelo khetha umuntfu lokhetfwe ukuze ucale inqubo yetinkhulumo tekucatjwa.

training.cart.training_type.online_num_p: Sicelo faka lunani lwabantfu (kumele kube munye).
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isaziso se-SafetyHelp: Tinsita tekucatjwa letiniketiwe tingetindzaba kuphela futsi atiwumeli umsebenti loqondzile. Ngetindlela te-OHS letakhelwe wena, sicelo tsintsana ne-SafetyHelp ku support@safetyhelp.co.za noma uvakashele Likusasa Lekutsinstsa.
training.checkout.success: Kukhokha Kuphumelele! Tinsita takho tekucatjwa takhiwe. Download i-PDF yakho ngephansi. Ngekucatjwa nge-inthanethi, tikhodi tekungena titfumele kuwe nge-imeyili.
training.providers.title: Bantfu Labatfumela Kucatjwa Labavunywe
training.providers.description: Ngabe udzinga kucatjwa lokungenele? Tsintsana nabantfu labatfumela kucatjwa labavunywe ngetimfuno takho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Ivunywe yi-SETA - Yakhela Lusito Lwekucala, Kucisha Umillo - Tintsintsa: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe yi-SACPCMP - Yakhela Kuphepha Kwekwakha - Tintsintsa: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Kucatjwa Lokusetulu kwe-OHS - Tintsintsa: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Tfola iBukhana Yekucatjwa Leyakhelwe Wena
training.manual.purchase.description: Tfolela ibukhana yekucatjwa leyakhelwe wena, lehlanganisa timfuno temthetho, imininingo leyakhelwe ngalokukhethekile ngesigaba sakho sengozi, kanye netintfo letitfulwa ngulabantfu labatfumela kucatjwa labavunywe.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza Sigaba Sengozi Yebukhana Yekucatjwa
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Sigaba Sengozi:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho Yekucatjwa
training.legal_fact.step_1: Umthetho Lofanele: Sigaba 8 se-OHS sifuna kutsi baphatsi banikele kucatjwa lokwakhelwe ngalokukhethekile ngetingozi letikhethekile tendzawo yekusebenta.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Tindzaba Letitfokotisako: Wawati yini kutsi kucatjwa lokungena kunganciphisa tiganeko tendzawo yekusebenta nge-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Umthetho Lofanele: Imikhandlu yemkhandlu ingaba nemithetho ye-OHS leyehlukene leya ngakhona timfuno tekucatjwa.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Tindzaba Letitfokotisako: Tindzawo tekusebenta letinengozi lephezulu njengesayithi yekwakha tidzinga kucatjwa lokungena ukuze kugcinwe tingadzi tekuphepha.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Umthetho Lofanele: Umthetho we-OHS ufuna kucatjwa lokukhethekile ngekwetimfuno letifana nebammeli be-SHE ukuze kucinisekiswe kutfobela.

suppliers.title: Luhlu Lwabaphatsi be-OHS
suppliers.description: Tfola futsi utshwaye baphatsi be-OHS eNingizimu Afrika. Sefa ngekwendzawo, tinsiza, kanye nalabo labavunywe. Tfumela timbono kute usite bantfu labanye kwekwenta tinkheto letinemibhalo.

suppliers.review_form.title: Tfumela Timbono
community_tools.title: Tinsita Tekuphepha Kwemphakatsi
community_tools.description: Bika tiganeko tekuphepha noma ingoti emphakatsini wakho noma endzaweni yakho yekusebenta, kusukela emgodini kuya etinsiteni letichitjiwe. Sebentisa tinsita tetfu kucinisekisa kuphepha etindzaweni letifana nemaveni e-spaza, tikolo, tibhedlela, kanye netavern.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Bika Tiganeko noma Ingozi
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Chaza tiganeko noma ingoti (sibonelo, umgodi e-Main Street, situlo lesichitjiwe esikhungweni semphakatsi)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Ligama Lakho Lemidiya Yemphakatsi (Ngokukhetfwa, sibonelo, @username e-X):
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Faka foni noma i-imeyili (itawugcwalwa ngokwayo uma umphatsi wetinsiza akhetfwe)...
Ligama Lemidiya Yemphakatsi Yemphatsi Wetinsiza (Ngokukhetfwa, sibonelo, @CityofJoburgZA e-X):
Faka ligama le-X (litawugcwalwa ngokwayo uma umphatsi wetinsiza akhetfwe)...
community_tools.list.title: Tinsita Letinye Tekuphepha Kwemphakatsi
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Luhlu Lwekuhlolwa kwe-OHS Lwemaveni e-Spaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Cinisekisa kutsi umaveni wakho e-spaza utfobela kuphepha kwemlilo, magetsi, kanye netimfuno tekwakha ngokwemthetho wemkhandlu kanye nemthetho we-OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Umkhombandlela Wekuphepha Kwemlilo Wesikolo
community_tools.list.school.description: Funda timfuno temthetho tekwakha kwemlilo etikolweni, kufaka ekhatsi tinhlelo tekuhlaluka kanye netinsita.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Umkhombandlela Wekulungiselela Tiphatsimandla Setibhedlela
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Cinisekisa kutsi tibhedlela tilungiselele tiphatsimandla ngetinhlelo tekuhlaluka letifanele kanye netinsita tekuphepha.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Luhlu Lwekuhlolwa kweKuphepha Kwetavern
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Hlola kutsi tavern titfobela umthetho wekuphepha kwemlilo kanye nekulawula umphakatsi kute tivimbele tiganeko.
dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi Yelilunga
dashboard.welcome: Wamukelekile, [Ligama Lemsebentisi]! Lawula kutfobela kwakho kwe-OHS, RMPs, tibiko tebaphatsi, kanye netibiko temphakatsi lapha.

document_categories.title: Yakha Emaphepha Akho eSistimu Yekulawula i-OHS
document_categories.description: Khetha futsi wakhe emaphepha lotawudzinga esistimuni yakho yekulawula i-OHS. Khetha kummiso, tinhlelo, tingadzi, kanye netinye, letakhelwe ngekwetimfuno temkhandlu wakho.
document_categories.policies.title: Immiso
document_categories.policies.description: Tichazelo tesigaba lephezulu setinhloso kanye nekutibophelela, letivunywe ngelawuli lephezulu.

document_categories.procedures.title: Tinhlelo
document_categories.procedures.descripti: Tindlela tesigaba ngesigaba, tekwekwenta umsebenti ngendlela lephephile kanye nelekutsi ungaphazamiseki.
document_categories.procedures.hira_proc: Tindlela Yekuhlola Ingozi kanye Nekuhlolwa Kwengozi (HIRA)

document_categories.standards.descriptio: Tingadzi temkhandlu letitfobela umthetho noma tingadzi temsebenti, letichaza sigaba noma indlela lokumele ikwentwe.
document_categories.standards.safe_drivi: Tingadzi Tekushayela Ngendlela Lephephile / Kulawula i-Fliti
